name: RRshooter
description:
RRShooter (working title) is a fast paced run 'n' gun game heavily inspired by bullet hell shooters. Boost through levels, blow up everything standing in your way and get high scores!

SETTING UP THE CONTROLS IN THE OPTIONS MENU AND DOING THE TUTORIAL IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. YOU MUST SWITCH TO DINPUT/XINPUT TO USE YOUR GAMEPAD.

If the game doesn't recognize your gamepad, x360ce should do the trick.

Default controls :

  • WASD - move
  • Space - jump/select
  • J - shoot/select
  • L - dash
  • I - bomb
  • Enter - pause
  • Alt + enter - fullscreen
